items.sentence: It's a long way from here. You'd better go by bus.
It goes without saying that we'll help each other.
The bouncer refused to let Tom and his friends in.
I think that I'd better do what Tom told me to do.
Don't forget that Tom and Mary used to be married.
I should've guessed you were the one who did this.
Tom was perilously close to the edge of the cliff.
I followed you because I didn't know who you were.
I wasn't surprised Tom didn't know how to do that.
I know that I have to do it. I just don't want to.
